mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board order by ref asc, ref_step asc;
mapper.insert: insert into board (writer, subject, email, content, password, wdate , ip, ref, ref_step, ref_level, readcount) values(#{writer},#{subject},#{email},#{content},#{password},NOW(),#{ip}, #{ref}, #{ref_step},#{ref_level}, #{readcount})
mapper.update: update board set readcount=readcount+1 where num=#{num}
